messages.subject: The Japanese Constitution 1889
messages.msgSnippet: I searched on jstor.org for Takeaki Enomoto and found the article the Japanese Constitution written by Kenneth Colegrove *unless I ve gone completely insane
messages.messageBody:
I searched on jstor.org for Takeaki Enomoto and found the article
"the Japanese Constitution"
written by Kenneth Colegrove

*unless I've gone completely insane I'm pretty sure I have not
uploaded/hosted this article before...

You may download the pdf file (citation is on the first page as
always)
at http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
password makoto
folder "ARTICLES"
